short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sustainablee helps you find out how sustainable the clothes you buy are.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sustainablee helps you find out how sustainable the clothes you buy are so you can get the most planet friendly clothes from your favorite brands. We currently rate some of the biggest stores such as ASOS, Pretty Little Things, H&M, Farfetch, Net-a-Porter, Nike, Bohoo, Shien, New Look and Fashion Nova. We're always looking to add more!

Scores are out of 5, the higher the more sustainable it is. It's broken down into an overall score and and breakdown scores. The breakdown scores are made up of  3 elements, water usage, carbon output and waste, the higher the breakdown score the more sustainable its usage of resources are.
